title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 53.6 - Updating the form
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 53.6 - Updating the form

State Regulations

An updated TD-1A form may be filed at any time, but not less than once every 12
months. When a change of ownership of a theatre, stadium, garden, arena or other place where theatre or sporting events are held occurs, an updated
form TD-1A shall be filed. Any form TD-1A's prior to the effective date of this Part shall be deemed in compliance with this Part unless: (1)
a change or modification takes place requiring an amendment, or
(2)
more than 12 months have passed since such form has been filed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
53.6

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
